channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Visual CSS Style Editor
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Visual CSS Style Editor

item.title: CVE-2021-24934|2024-08-03T19:49:14.011Z -- unknown -- visual%20css%20style%20editor
item.description: The Visual CSS Style Editor WordPress plugin before 7.5.4 does not sanitise and escape the wyp_page_type parameter before outputting it back in an admin page, leading to a Reflected Cross-Site Scripting issue
